title: New Year's Eve

banner_image.name: PH_NYE_937x400
banner_image.alt: Padre: 1920's woman with party hat on holding clock counting down until midnight of New Year's Eve

description:
DINE
Celebrating our locals with food and drink pairings featuring locally sourced food, wine and spirits as you toast 2019 with five courses at Belvedere Room. $95 includes admission to the party.
5pm & 8pm seatings
VIEW MENU>
MAKE A RESO >>

PARTY
Bring in 2019 in style at The Padre Hotel with two stories of celebration.
1st Floor: Two DJs at Prosopect Lounge & Brimstone
2nd Floor: Soulpeople on Prairie Fire patio
Champagne Toast at midnight
$20 pre-sale, $30 door
TICKETS >>

STAY
Rates starting at $250. Room packages include NYE party admission, party favors and bottle of champagne
72 hour cancellation policy
**Receive $25 off room rates if also reserving NYE dinner at Belvedere Room, discount applied at check-in
BOOK A ROOM >>
short_description: Pop, fizz, clink! Toast 2019 with decadent dining and two stories of fun at the Padre Hotel!
